content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":237372,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リクチェルにご用事？","translatedEnglishLine":"Got business with Rikuchel?"},{"lineNumber":237373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、やいやいやい！","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no, no no no!"},{"lineNumber":237374,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黙って聞いてりゃ、勝手なこと言いやがって！","translatedEnglishLine":"You're just sitting there silently and saying whatever you want!"},{"lineNumber":237375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「明日の試合はこの＜エール＞だぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Tomorrow's match is all about me, <Yell>!"},{"lineNumber":237376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセットさんには、こいつが！","translatedEnglishLine":"Against Reset-san, it's gonna be me!"},{"lineNumber":237377,"originalJapaneseLine":"　指一本だって触れさせないんだからな！","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't even let them touch him with a single finger!"},{"lineNumber":237378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な？　そうだよな、＜エール＞？","translatedEnglishLine":"R-right? Isn't that right, <Yell>?"},{"lineNumber":237379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よく言った、＜エール＞！","translatedEnglishLine":"Well said, <Yell>!"},{"lineNumber":237380,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こいつが本気になったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"When I get serious,"},{"lineNumber":237381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前なんかもう、けっちょんけっちょんの――","translatedEnglishLine":"You'll be completely wiped out—"},{"lineNumber":237382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうだ！　＜エール＞が頑張るんだぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah! <Yell> is gonna do his best!"},{"lineNumber":237383,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ど、どーっだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-how about that!"},{"lineNumber":237384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、頑張るって……","translatedEnglishLine":"You say 'do your best' but..."},{"lineNumber":237385,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頼りないなぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"You're so unreliable..."},{"lineNumber":237386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだよ……頼りないなぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what the heck... so unreliable..."},{"lineNumber":237387,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵の前なんだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"We're in front of the enemy,"},{"lineNumber":237388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここはハッタリでいいんだよぉ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fine to bluff here."},{"lineNumber":237389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":237390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"*Pffft*"},{"lineNumber":237391,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アハハハハ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahahaha...!"},{"lineNumber":237392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なーんてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just kidding."},{"lineNumber":237393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":237394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「冗談よ、冗談。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just a joke, just a joke."},{"lineNumber":237395,"originalJapaneseLine":"　タチの悪いジョーク","translatedEnglishLine":"A pretty bad joke at that."},{"lineNumber":237396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":237397,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し、ほんの少しだけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just a little, just a tiny bit,"},{"lineNumber":237398,"originalJapaneseLine":"今まで仏頂面をしていたリクチェルの表情に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In Rikuchel's previously stern expression,"},{"lineNumber":237399,"originalJapaneseLine":"憂いが帯びられ、瞳は潤んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a trace of sorrow appeared, and their eyes became moist."},{"lineNumber":237400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの馬鹿な子だけなのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's only that foolish child."},{"lineNumber":237401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みーんなから嫌われているリクチェルを、","translatedEnglishLine":"The one who said she liked Rikuchel, even though everyone hates them—"},{"lineNumber":237402,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでも好きだと言ってくれた子……」","translatedEnglishLine":"the child who still said she loved me..."},{"lineNumber":237403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが……本当に嬉しくて、ね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That... truly made me happy..."},{"lineNumber":237404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの子がリクチェルを、","translatedEnglishLine":"As long as that child considers Rikuchel,"},{"lineNumber":237405,"originalJapaneseLine":"　友達だと言ってくれる限り、","translatedEnglishLine":"a friend,"},{"lineNumber":237406,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの子にはひどいことをしない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't do anything terrible to her."},{"lineNumber":237407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「不躾なお願いなんだけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a rude request, but..."},{"lineNumber":237408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「明日、勝ちを譲ってくれないかしら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could you let me win tomorrow...?"},{"lineNumber":237409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":237410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに言ってんだ、って思うわよね……","translatedEnglishLine":"You're probably thinking 'What are you saying?' right now..."},{"lineNumber":237411,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、でもね……","translatedEnglishLine":"But, but you see..."},{"lineNumber":237412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リクチェル、あの子とお話がしたいだけなの……","translatedEnglishLine":"Rikuchel just wants to talk to that child..."},{"lineNumber":237413,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、素直にそんなこともう言えたりしない","translatedEnglishLine":"But I can't honestly say that anymore."},{"lineNumber":237414,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、お願いなの……","translatedEnglishLine":"So, I'm asking you..."},{"lineNumber":237415,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日はリクチェルの為に負けてくれない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could you lose tomorrow for Rikuchel's sake?"},{"lineNumber":237416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へえ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh...?"},{"lineNumber":237417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおいおい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, hey!"},{"lineNumber":237418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　騙されるなよ、＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't be fooled, <Yell>!"},{"lineNumber":237419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうだ！　よく言ったぞ、＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah! Well said, <Yell>!"},{"lineNumber":237420,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、嘘つくなよな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"D-don't lie!"},{"lineNumber":237421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":237422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「嘘？」","translatedEnglishLine":"A lie?"},{"lineNumber":237423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どういうことかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you mean?"},{"lineNumber":237424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、だって、あんた酒場で、","translatedEnglishLine":"B-but, you said clearly at the tavern,"},{"lineNumber":237425,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人から好かれても楽しくないって","translatedEnglishLine":"that being liked by others isn't fun,"},{"lineNumber":237426,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハッキリと言ってたじゃないか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"didn't you say that clearly?"},{"lineNumber":237427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":237428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当はそれで勝ちを譲ってもらって、","translatedEnglishLine":"You actually want them to let you win,"},{"lineNumber":237429,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセットさんにひどいことしようってんだろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"so you can do something terrible to Reset-san, right?"},{"lineNumber":237430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah..."},{"lineNumber":237431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんてひどいことを言うの……","translatedEnglishLine":"What a terrible thing to say..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黙って聞いてりゃ、勝手なこと言いやがって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're just sitting there silently and saying whatever you want!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日の試合はこの＜エール＞だぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow's match is all about me, <Yell>!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットさんには、こいつが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against Reset-san, it's gonna be me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指一本だって触れさせないんだからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't even let them touch him with a single finger!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な？　そうだよな、＜エール＞？
こいつが本気になったら、
お前なんかもう、けっちょんけっちょんの――
「そ、そうだ！　＜エール＞が頑張るんだぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yeah! <Yell> is gonna do his best!
We're in front of the enemy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはハッタリでいいんだよぉ

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a joke, just a joke.
A pretty bad joke at that.
Just a little, just a tiny bit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで仏頂面をしていたリクチェルの表情に、
憂いが帯びられ、瞳は潤んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a trace of sorrow appeared, and their eyes became moist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みーんなから嫌われているリクチェルを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who said she liked Rikuchel, even though everyone hates them—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも好きだと言ってくれた子……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the child who still said she loved me...
As long as that child considers Rikuchel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友達だと言ってくれる限り、
あの子にはひどいことをしない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't do anything terrible to her.
This is a rude request, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日、勝ちを譲ってくれないかしら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you let me win tomorrow...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに言ってんだ、って思うわよね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're probably thinking 'What are you saying?' right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リクチェル、あの子とお話がしたいだけなの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rikuchel just wants to talk to that child...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、素直にそんなこともう言えたりしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I can't honestly say that anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日はリクチェルの為に負けてくれない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you lose tomorrow for Rikuchel's sake?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうだ！　よく言ったぞ、＜エール＞！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-but, you said clearly at the tavern,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人から好かれても楽しくないって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that being liked by others isn't fun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハッキリと言ってたじゃないか！」
「本当はそれで勝ちを譲ってもらって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You actually want them to let you win,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットさんにひどいことしようってんだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you can do something terrible to Reset-san, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてひどいことを言うの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a terrible thing to say...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黙って聞いてりゃ、勝手なこと言いやがって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're just sitting there silently and saying whatever you want!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日の試合はこの＜エール＞だぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow's match is all about me, <Yell>!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットさんには、こいつが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against Reset-san, it's gonna be me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指一本だって触れさせないんだからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't even let them touch him with a single finger!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な？　そうだよな、＜エール＞？
こいつが本気になったら、
お前なんかもう、けっちょんけっちょんの――
「そ、そうだ！　＜エール＞が頑張るんだぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yeah! <Yell> is gonna do his best!
We're in front of the enemy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはハッタリでいいんだよぉ

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a joke, just a joke.
A pretty bad joke at that.
Just a little, just a tiny bit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで仏頂面をしていたリクチェルの表情に、
憂いが帯びられ、瞳は潤んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a trace of sorrow appeared, and their eyes became moist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みーんなから嫌われているリクチェルを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who said she liked Rikuchel, even though everyone hates them—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも好きだと言ってくれた子……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the child who still said she loved me...
As long as that child considers Rikuchel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友達だと言ってくれる限り、
あの子にはひどいことをしない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't do anything terrible to her.
This is a rude request, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日、勝ちを譲ってくれないかしら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you let me win tomorrow...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに言ってんだ、って思うわよね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're probably thinking 'What are you saying?' right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リクチェル、あの子とお話がしたいだけなの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rikuchel just wants to talk to that child...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、素直にそんなこともう言えたりしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I can't honestly say that anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日はリクチェルの為に負けてくれない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you lose tomorrow for Rikuchel's sake?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうだ！　よく言ったぞ、＜エール＞！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-but, you said clearly at the tavern,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人から好かれても楽しくないって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that being liked by others isn't fun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハッキリと言ってたじゃないか！」
「本当はそれで勝ちを譲ってもらって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You actually want them to let you win,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットさんにひどいことしようってんだろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you can do something terrible to Reset-san, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてひどいことを言うの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a terrible thing to say...
